As many as 18,139 new cases of novel coronavirus were reported, with Indias total COVID-19 cases now above 1.04 crore, as per health ministrys January 8, 2021 update.

articles.author: TRTWorld
articles.title: Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine effective against mutation Covid-19 variant – study - TRT World
articles.description: The study by Pfizer and scientists from the University of Texas Medical Branch, that is yet to be peer reviewed, has indicated that the vaccine is effective in neutralising the virus with the so-called N501Y mutation of the spike protein.
